price: Wọ́n wí pé: “Bákan náà ni fún wa; yálà o ṣe wáàsí fún wa tàbí o ò sí nínú àwọn oníwáàsí.”
arabic: قَالُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡنَآ أَوَعَظۡتَ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡوَٰعِظِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sawāon ʿalaynā awaʿaẓta am lam takun mina al-wāʿiẓīna
